text: @JustinTrudeau @POTUS When you discussed Covid-19 I hope you reiterated our need to keep the border closed until the US gets it’s house in order.  We do not deserve to have our 4 months of hard work isolating and distancing to go down the drain because the US wouldn’t do it.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
